modules.description: Provides date selection and formatting operations, including picking a date via a native dialog and converting date values to localized string representations. Works with native date objects and string formats specific to mobile platforms. Enables user interaction for date input in mobile applications and ensures consistent date display across different locales.

Provides functions to configure and display a date picker with customizable options such as date range, labels, and appearance. Works with date objects, strings, and custom types for mode, theme, and direction. Used to present a native date selection interface in mobile applications with specific styling and behavioral constraints.
